scripts.print-storybook-export-js-msg: echo "----> Building JS files for Storybook-export tool, from /app/components/**/*.{js,ts} (except for .stories.{js,ts} and components/_ts-helpers/*.ts) to /app/dist/asset-txt/components/**/*.js.txt. Minified if in production environment."
scripts.print-drupal-js-msg: echo "----> Building JS files for Drupal, from /app/components/**/*.{js,ts} (except for .stories.{js,ts} and components/_ts-helpers/*.ts) to /app/dist/components/**/*.js. Minified if in production environment."
scripts.build-storybook-export-js: npm run print-storybook-export-js-msg && npx babel components --extensions '.js','.ts' --ignore 'components/**/*.stories.js','components/**/*.stories.ts','components/_ts-helpers/*.ts' --config-file ./.babelrc.config.js --out-dir dist/asset-txt/components --out-file-extension .js.txt
scripts.build-drupal-js: npm run print-drupal-js-msg && npx babel components --extensions '.js','.ts' --ignore 'components/**/*.stories.js','components/**/*.stories.ts','components/_ts-helpers/*.ts' --config-file ./.babelrc.config.js --out-dir dist/components
scripts.build-js: npm run build-drupal-js & npm run build-storybook-export-js
scripts.print-drupal-css-msg: echo "----> Building CSS for Drupal. Everything (including rules from component-level CSS files) ends up in just a single /app/dist/css/tailwind.css file, with prose rules duplicated in /app/dist/css/cke_editable.css"
scripts.build-drupal-css: npm run print-drupal-css-msg && postcss css/**/*.css --base css --dir dist/css --verbose
